00029 #include "AbstractCellProperty.hpp"
00030 #include "Exception.hpp"
00031 
00032 #include <typeinfo>
00033 
00034 AbstractCellProperty::AbstractCellProperty()
00035     : mCellCount(0)
00036 {
00037 }
00038 
00039 AbstractCellProperty::~AbstractCellProperty()
00040 {
00041 }
00042 
00043 bool AbstractCellProperty::IsSame(const AbstractCellProperty* pOther) const
00044 {
00045     const std::type_info& r_our_info = typeid(*this);
00046     const std::type_info& r_their_info = typeid(*pOther);
00047     return r_our_info == r_their_info;
00048 }
00049 
00050 bool AbstractCellProperty::IsSame(boost::shared_ptr<const AbstractCellProperty> pOther) const
00051 {
00052     return IsSame(pOther.get());
00053 }
00054 
00055 void AbstractCellProperty::IncrementCellCount()
00056 {
00057     mCellCount++;
00058 }
00059 
00060 void AbstractCellProperty::DecrementCellCount()
00061 {
00062     if (mCellCount == 0)
00063     {
00064         EXCEPTION("Cannot decrement cell count: no cells have this cell property");
00065     }
00066     mCellCount--;
00067 }
00068 
00069 unsigned AbstractCellProperty::GetCellCount() const
00070 {
00071     return mCellCount;
00072 }
